chapter.title: Debugging
chapter.para: Log output from GridShib is a useful tool for debugging issues. Because GridShib is built on top of Java WS Core, developer debugging is the same as described in . For information about sys admin logging, see in the Admin Guide.

section.title: Enabling verbose logging
section.para: As described in the above section, configuration files need to be edited to enable logging at different levels. For example, to see all debug logging statements for the delegation service, the following line needs to be added: log4j.category.org.globus.gridshib.gt=DEBUG
